first_translate: how is it?
second_translate: How is it?

first_translate: does it look okay?
second_translate: Doesn't it look awkward?

first_translate: it looks fine.
second_translate: It's not awkward.

first_translate: oh! that’s right!
second_translate: Oh! Yeah!

first_translate: keep your face covered like that.
second_translate: Keep your face hidden like that.

hangle: 내 머리색 보다 네 외모가 더 눈에 띌 테니까.
first_translate: your looks will attract more attention than my hair color.
second_translate: Your looks will stand out more than my hair color.

hangle: …너 정말 분위기 깨는 데 뭐 있다…
first_translate: you really have a knack for ruining the mood...
second_translate: You really have a knack for ruining the mood...

first_translate: huh.
second_translate: Hoh.

first_translate: this place looks more decent than I thought.
second_translate: This mansion looks more decent than I expected.

first_translate: I wonder how they manage the demons.
second_translate: I wonder how they manage the monsters.

first_translate: I’m not sure.
second_translate: I'm not sure.

first_translate: all right, get up!
second_translate: All right, get up!

first_translate: hey, hit it harder!
second_translate: hey, hit harder!

first_translate: move,
second_translate: Move.

first_translate: I said move!
second_translate: Move!

first_translate: this is dangerous.
second_translate: This is dangerous.

first_translate: it is.
second_translate: It's dangerous.

first_translate: you crazy bastard!
second_translate: You crazy bastard!

first_translate: I-I’m your trainer!!
second_translate: I-I'm your caretaker!!

hangle: 관리가 안 되는걸 보아하니 조만간 큰 사고가 터지겠는데.
first_translate: they’re not managing the demons properly. a big incident is bound to happen soon.
second_translate: Seeing how poorly they’re managing things, a big incident is bound to happen soon.

first_translate: fiona.
second_translate: Fiona.

first_translate: this place is bigger than I thought.
second_translate: It's larger in scale than I expected.

hangle: 그리고 정체가 짐작 가는 귀족이 몇 명 보여.
first_translate: I see a few nobles that I can guess the identities of.
second_translate: And I see a few nobles whose identities I can guess.

hangle: 헤일론과 네 휘하의 기사단만으로 뒤집기는 힘들까?
first_translate: would it be hard to overturn the situation with just you and the knights of house hylon?
second_translate: Would it be hard to overturn the situation with just Heilun and your knights?

first_translate: if we just capture the people,
second_translate: If we manage to capture the people,

hangle: 혼란 속에서 운 나쁘게 마물이 풀린다면 위험하겠지.
first_translate: it’ll be dangerous if the demons are released by accident during the chaos.
second_translate: It would be dangerous if the demons happened to be released amidst the chaos.

first_translate: that’s true...
second_translate: That makes sense...

hangle: 게다가 시그렌과 헤일론 가문, 둘이서만 협조했다가는 꼭 뒷말이 나오겠지.
first_translate: on top of that, people will talk if only house hylon and I cooperate.
second_translate: On top of that, if Siegren and House Hylon cooperate alone, there will definitely be rumors.

hangle: 깔끔하게 처리하려면 중립 귀족을 끌어들이는게 좋을까?
first_translate: would it be better to bring in some neutral nobles to handle this cleanly?
second_translate: Would it be better to involve some neutral nobles to handle this cleanly?

first_translate: fiona, over there.
second_translate: Fiona, look over there.

first_translate: the crown prince is here.
second_translate: The crown prince is here.

first_translate: what? where?!
second_translate: What? Where?!

first_translate: I don’t see him.
second_translate: I can't see him.

first_translate: he’s further down.
second_translate: He's further down.

first_translate: he’s going inside somewhere...
second_translate: He's going inside somewhere...

first_translate: oh! there he is.
second_translate: Ah! Over there!

first_translate: why is he going inside?
second_translate: Why is he going further inside?

first_translate: I’m not sure...
second_translate: I'm not sure.

first_translate: but I’m sure it’s not for a good reason.
second_translate: I'm sure it's not for a good reason.

first_translate: hm...
second_translate: Hm...

first_translate: what? is this all you have?
second_translate: What? Is this all there is?

first_translate: what about the high-level demons I mentioned last time?
second_translate: What about the high-level monsters I mentioned last time?

first_translate: I’m sorry, but we don’t have them yet...
second_translate: I’m sorry, but that’s not available yet...

first_translate: you’re so slow.
second_translate: You're ridiculously slow.

hangle: 멍청한 녀석, 그걸 준비하는게 쉬운 줄 알아?
first_translate: you fool. do you think it’s easy to prepare those?
second_translate: You fool, do you think preparing that is easy?

hangle: 하지만 황태자가 내 투기장을 마음에 들어 하는 건 정말 천운이지.
first_translate: but it’s a stroke of luck that the crown prince likes my arena.
second_translate: But it’s truly a stroke of luck that the crown prince likes my arena.

hangle: 돈만 좀 주면 투기장이 불법이라는 것도 눈 감아 주니까.
first_translate: he turns a blind eye to the fact that the arena is illegal as long as I give him some money.
second_translate: He turns a blind eye to the fact that the arena is illegal as long as he gets some money.

hangle: 비위 맞추는 것 정도는 해줄 수 있지!
first_translate: I can at least keep him pleased!
second_translate: I can at least keep him satisfied!

hangle: 한시라도 빨리 더 재밌는 걸 준비하겠습니다.
first_translate: I’ll prepare something more interesting as soon as possible.
second_translate: I'll prepare something even more entertaining as soon as possible.

hangle: 생각보다 사업의 규모가 너무 큰 것 같아.
first_translate: I think the scale of this business is bigger than I thought.
second_translate: I think this business is on a much larger scale than I expected.

first_translate: I agree.
second_translate: I agree.

hangle: 황태자를 끌어들이면서 사업의 규모가 원작보다 더 커져 버렸어.
first_translate: the scale of the business has grown bigger than the original story after the crown prince got involved.
second_translate: The scale of the business has grown larger than in the original story after involving the crown prince.

first_translate: I didn’t think it would be this big. that was a mistake.
second_translate: I didn’t think this far. That was an oversight.

hangle: 이쯤 되면 정말로 다른 귀족가의 힘을 빌려야겠는데.
first_translate: at this point, I really need to borrow the power of another noble family.
second_translate: At this point, I really need to enlist the help of another noble family.

first_translate: but I can’t ask for livia’s help.
second_translate: But I can't rely on Livia's help.

first_translate: then...
second_translate: Then...

first_translate: there’s only one person left.
second_translate: It has to be him after all.

first_translate: oh my.
second_translate: Damn.

hangle: 피오나 영애가 절 부른 건 실로 의외군요.
first_translate: I’m surprised that you called for me, lady fiona.
second_translate: I'm quite surprised that Lady Fiona has summoned me.

first_translate: yes...
second_translate: Yeah...

hangle: 진짜로 도움이 될 수 있는게 이놈 뿐이라니…
first_translate: I can’t believe he’s the only one who can help me...
second_translate: I can't believe he's the only one who can actually be of help...

hangle: 후작님이 흥미를 가질 만한 사안이 있어서요.
first_translate: I have a matter that might interest you, my lord.
second_translate: I have a matter that might pique your interest, my lord.

hangle: 전 딱히 황자 전하의 편을 들 생각은 없습니다.
first_translate: I’m not particularly interested in taking the crown prince’s side.
second_translate: I have no intention of taking the crown prince’s side.

hangle: 저도 그런 부탁을 할 생각으로 온 건 아닙니다.
first_translate: I didn’t come here to ask for that.
second_translate: I didn’t come here to make that kind of request either.

first_translate: then what brings you here...?
second_translate: Then what brings you here?

first_translate: I hope this will be an interesting time.
second_translate: I hope this turns out to be an interesting time.

hangle: 그냥 시간 낭비하기 싫다고 말 하지 그러니.
first_translate: why don’t you just say that you don’t want to waste time?
second_translate: Why don’t you just say you don’t want to waste time?

hangle: 후작님, 요즘 재무부를 운영하시는 게 힘들지 않으신가요?
first_translate: my lord, isn’t it hard to run the ministry of finance these days?
second_translate: My lord, isn't managing the Ministry of Finance difficult these days?

hangle: 황제나 황후가 사치가 꽤 심한 편이지.
first_translate: the emperor and empress are quite extravagant.
second_translate: The emperor and empress are quite extravagant.

first_translate: nothing in the world comes easy.
second_translate: Nothing in the world comes easy.

first_translate: you’re right.
second_translate: You're right.

hangle: 하지만 요즘 후작님을 더 피곤하게 하는 자들이 있는 모양이더군요.
first_translate: but it seems like there are people who are making things even harder for you these days.
second_translate: But it seems there are people making things even more difficult for you these days.

first_translate: lady fiona...
second_translate: Lady Fiona...

hangle: 피오나 영애만큼 사교계 화법이 안 어울리는 영애는 처음 봅니다.
first_translate: I’ve never seen a lady who is as bad at using the language of high society as you.
second_translate: I've never seen a lady as unsuited to the language of high society as you.

hangle: 어색하니 그냥 본론을 말씀하시는 걸 추천합니다.
first_translate: it’s awkward, so I recommend that you just get to the point.
second_translate: Since it feels awkward, I recommend just getting to the point.

hangle: 어차피 빙빙 돌려 말하는 건 저도 시간 낭비라는 생각이 들고.
first_translate: after all, I think beating around the bush is a waste of time.
second_translate: After all, I also think beating around the bush is a waste of time.

first_translate: don’t go back on your word later.
second_translate: Don’t go back on your word.

first_translate: here.
second_translate: Take it.

first_translate: what is this?
second_translate: What is it?

first_translate: what do you think?
second_translate: What do you think?

hangle: 같이 세금 안 내는 놈들 잡으러 갈래요?
first_translate: do you want to go catch some tax evaders with me?
second_translate: Do you want to go catch those tax evaders with me?

hangle: 전 귀족 영애들에게 정말로 많은 제안을 받았습니다.
first_translate: I’ve received many offers from noble ladies.
second_translate: I've received numerous proposals from noble ladies.

first_translate: they asked me to go watch a play together...
second_translate: They asked me to go see a play together...

first_translate: ...or to have tea together.
second_translate: ...or to have tea together.

first_translate: however,
second_translate: But.

hangle: 지금까지 받았던 제안 중에 제일 마음에 드는 건 이거군요.
first_translate: this is the best offer I’ve received so far.
second_translate: This is the most appealing offer I've received so far.
